title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama official repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list, delete models.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama: synchronous & async APIs, streaming, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama: chat, embeddings, tool-calling chains.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama: markdown, code highlighting, model switching, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, list, delete, embeddings, vision.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: simple interface to chat and generate with local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI with interactive chat, conversation history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing Ollama completions inline like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot UI for Ollama: TypeScript, Tailwind, streaming, Markdown, code highlight.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop GUI for Ollama: cross-platform, model manager, chat interface.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama: reproducible builds, CUDA/ROCm accelerations.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama: async client, streaming chat, generate, embeddings.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama: simple API, streaming, embeddings, model ops.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks for CPU & GPU deployments.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration: OllamaGenerator, OllamaChatGenerator for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration for Ollama: REST client, chat templates, actuator metrics.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot bringing Ollama models to Discord servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines: pull models, run tests, generate docs with Ollama.
